title: The influence of Renaissance grottoes and cabinets on modern museums
excerpt: A deep dive into Renaissance collecting practices and their lasting impact on modern museums, through the lens of Isabella d'Este's grotto and cabinets of curiosity.

title: How Responsibility and Ethical Issues of Museums Are Impacted by Activism
excerpt: An examination of how activism addresses social responsibility and ethical challenges in museums through case studies of the Benin Bronze repatriation and Ground Zero memorial construction.

title: Analysing The Eighteenth-Century Interior Through Morning
excerpt: Exploring 18th-century French aristocratic life through Nicholas Lancret's genre painting 'Morning', examining furniture, luxury goods, and elite social practices of the period.

title: An Art Historical Analysis of Travelling Chocolate Service
excerpt: Examining an 18th-century French travelling chocolate service as a window into elite lifestyle, luxury trade networks, and social status markers of the period.

title: The Influence of Renaissance Grottoes and Cabinets on Modern Museums
excerpt: Exploring how Renaissance collecting practices shaped modern museum concepts through Isabella d'Este's grotto and curiosity cabinets.

title: The Fahua Gourd Vase: A Ming Dynasty Masterpiece
excerpt: Examining the artistic techniques, royal symbolism, and international influences in a 16th-century Chinese ceramic masterpiece.

title: Exploring the Taoxi River Cultural Community Project
excerpt: How Jingdezhen transformed an abandoned porcelain factory into an internationally acclaimed cultural community.

title: Renaissance and Contemporary Art: Bridging Past and Present
excerpt: Examining how Renaissance masterpieces continue to inspire contemporary artists through digital reinterpretation and cultural dialogue.

title: Analysis of the Embroidered Chinese Jacket: Craftsmanship and Cultural Significance
excerpt: Exploring the intricate craftsmanship, cultural symbolism, and social significance of a traditional Chinese embroidered jacket.
